humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the 'greatest dimension of largest focus of invasion over 0.1 cm: 2 cm' for the invasive ductal carcinoma. Based on the rules provided, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less in size. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the largest focus of invasion is 2 cm, which falls within the T2 category (tumor size 2.1-5 cm) according to the AJCC classification (7th ed). Therefore, the T stage from this report is T2.
